text_block_list.text: After school, I spotted Matikanetannhauser and the others soliciting on the school grounds.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Step right up, take a look! It's the O-Machi & Palmer Love Counseling Room~.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: If you're worrying alone, just let it all out~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer! Ehehe, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I grew up hearing the ABCs of life from customers at my family's teishoku restaurant!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You can leave love talk to me with confidence!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: And I thought it sounded fun, so I started doing it with her!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me... is this okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah, welcome~. Don't hesitate, just talk about anything.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Um... actually, I'm in a long-distance relationship...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, a long-distance relationship~. That's a common theme that comes up~.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Being apart makes you think about all sorts of things, so worries probably pile up~, I bet.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: ...Yes, not being able to meet is lonely... and I don't know what to do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah. Wanting to meet but not being able to is tough.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ...So, Tannhauser? Got any advice you can give?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm! Let me share my personal experience here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You see, I also have times when I really crave my family's grilled mackerel teishoku.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh, grilled mackerel teishoku...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But I can't go back right away. I endure it, endure it until I can visit home...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...And because I endured, the deliciousness when I finally ate it was double, no, quadruple!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So if the feeling of longing is 100, then the happiness when you meet... not when you're eaten, but when you meet, is over 200!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: P... pfft, hehehe, sorry...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah-ha, ahahahaha! Long-distance love talk turning into grilled mackerel is just too wild!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Huh? Did I say something weird?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Nah, it's funny, but not weird!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hmm... I strangely found myself relating to that.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: The happiness when you meet is bigger because you can't see each other... Hehe, I see. Maybe it's better to think of it as not just loneliness, but an increase in anticipation!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. That's actually good advice. You're good, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehem. Leave love advice to me!
choice_data_list: That sounded kinda delicious, didn't it?
That was resolved in a snap, huh!
That was resolved in a snap, wasn't it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehem. Leave love advice to me!
choice_data_list: That sounded kinda delicious, didn't it?
That was resolved in a snap, huh!
That was resolved in a snap, wasn't it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh... talking about food is making me hungrier and hungrier.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Grilled mackerel... might be out of reach, but I want to eat something!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Well then, let's go to a cafe now! Once we're full, we'll feel even more energetic♪

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Yes!
The three of them enjoyed their meal while chatting about love!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. I'll keep solving things one by one like this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser's love counseling, with its unexpected solutions, might become popular!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm! I sense a troubled girl over there!
For a while, Matikanetannhauser went around searching for love troubles!
